word: SOME HAVE ASKED A QUESTION ABOUT HER POSITION AMONG US.  SHE WAS NEVER ELECTED TO ANY OFFICE.  SHE NEVER DESIRED ANY OFFICE.  WHEN A PERSON WOULD SPEAK OF ANY PARTICULAR WORK, SHE WOULD SAY, "MY WORK TO WHICH GOD HAS CALLED ME IS TO BE HIS MESSENGER," AND THAT WAS HER HIGHEST DESIRE, TO BE THE MESSENGER OF JESUS CHRIST.
